mapper.insert: insert into shenqingbiao(stuID, stuName, profession, test, average, course, myself, school) values (#{stuID}, #{stuName}, #{profession}, #{test}, #{average}, #{course}, #{myself}, #{school})
mapper.delete: delete from shenqingbiao where stuID= (select studentid from user where id=#{id})
mapper.select: select * from shenqingbiao where id = (select s.id from shenqingbiao s left outer join user u on s.stuID=u.studentid where u.id=#{id})
select stuID, stuName, school, profession, test, average, audit from shenqingbiao where (stuID, stuName) in (select studentid, username from user u where u.id = #{id} )

select * from shenqingbiao
and stuName like concat('%', #{stuName}, '%')
and stuID like concat('%', #{stuID}, '%')
and profession like concat('%', #{profession}, '%')
